changes: MAKE VIDEOS v3.0 OVERHAUL COMPLETE — 13 Python scripts, 15 specialized skills, 6-step pipeline with hash-based idempotency and Social UI Safe Zone enforcement.

NEW: 15 specialized skills — batch-ffmpeg-processor, beat-sync-editor, thumbnail-generator, format-converter, lyric-overlay, audio-analyzer, comfyui-launcher, artist-profile-manager, character-asset-factory, mood-mapper, meme-sign-generator, character-animator, safe-zone-validator, baseline-recipe-builder, render-signature-manager.

NEW: 7 skill definitions — analyze-song, generate-visuals, assemble-video, batch-produce, artist-profile, format-convert, quality-check.

NEW: 12 artist profiles generated from catalog data (Bajan Sun, Dust & Thunder, Echoes of Jahara, Frozen Cloud, Fuego Urbano, Harbor Grey, Honest Mile, Mercury Halo, Park Bellevue, Phantom Frenzy, Stone Meridian, Thomas Wren).

agents.name: Frozen Cloud Website
agents.purpose: Static HTML landing page for Frozen Cloud music artist — showcases releases, videos, sync licensing contact, and press kit.
agents.notes: Tier 3 complete: Cloudflare + Ahrefs + Canva + Figma embedded in RULES.md.

agents.name: Make Videos
agents.purpose: Full-stack automated video production pipeline. Transforms 121+ song catalog across 21 genres into branded visual content featuring Weeter & Blubby characters. 6-step pipeline: Ingestion → Preflight → Analysis → Creation → Assembly → Cataloging. Produces 7 output formats per song with resolution-aware vertical strategy, hash-based idempotency, and Social UI Safe Zone enforcement.
agents.notes: OVERHAUL v3.0: Full-stack pipeline with 15 specialized skills, 13 Python scripts, Weeter & Blubby character integration, 6-step pipeline with hash-based idempotency. Safe Zone enforcement, 121+ song catalog processing, 7 output formats per song.

agents.name: Make-Music
agents.purpose: Songwriting and MIDI composition workspace for acoustic guitar-based ballads — chord sheets, MIDI generation scripts, Logic Pro projects, and Suno prompts.
agents.notes: Melon music charts embedded for production direction. Tests/ directory clean.

agents.name: Ridgemont Catalog Manager
agents.purpose: Central operational engine for Ridgemont Studio's 98-song music catalog spanning three acts — manages song metadata, financials, pitching, deployment tracking, and shortcode automation.
agents.notes: v10 fix: Identity + Behavior Guidelines + Related Agents sections added. Version 5.5. Full connector stack: Melon + MotherDuck + Stripe + PayPal.

agents.name: Ridgemont Studio Website
agents.purpose: Music label website and platform — artist roster, authenticated music streaming via Cloudflare Workers, Firebase auth, sync licensing marketplace.
agents.notes: Most connected agent — 8 MCP connectors embedded. Full design + analytics + payments stack.

agents.name: Suno Studio
agents.purpose: Suno v5.0 AI music prompt generator — deterministic prompt generation with 4-engine architecture, 122 subgenres, 1228 tags, 1223 instruments, and 9 presets.
agents.notes: v10 fix: Identity + Related Agents sections added. Create-shortcut skill ref for workflow automation.

agents.name: Bajan Sun Website
agents.purpose: Web presence for Bajan Sun Publishing (Act 3) — artist landing page, content strategy, brand development.
agents.notes: Minimal connector needs. Content + brand voice focused.

agents.name: Park Bellevue Website
agents.purpose: Web presence for Park Bellevue Collective (Act 2) — artist landing page, community engagement, content strategy.

agents.name: X-Posts
agents.purpose: Daily crypto/blockchain X posting for @4_Bchainbasics — 3-5 posts daily with character mascots (Weeter & Blubby), deadpan voice styling, humanization algorithms, and approval workflow.
agents.notes: Canva + Ahrefs embedded for design + SEO. Enterprise-search skill ref for cross-source research. Daily active usage.

agents.name: Ridgemont Catalog Portal
agents.purpose: Unified read-only Streamlit catalog portal for all 3 acts — dashboard, catalog browsing, deployment tracking, and financials.
agents.notes: MotherDuck SQL + Amplitude analytics embedded. Catalog-sync + xlsx skill refs active.

agents.name: Dewey Cheatem, Esq.
agents.purpose: Legal research and advisory agent for U.S. Federal, California, and Idaho law — case law research via CourtListener, statute lookup, contract review, IRAC analysis. NOT a licensed attorney.
agents.notes: Consensus + Scholar Gateway embedded for academic legal research. Legal-memo + pdf skills active.

agents.name: Dr. Vinnie Boombatz
agents.purpose: Comprehensive medical AI agent — evidence-based medical information, research synthesis, drug lookups, lab interpretation, differential diagnosis. Uses PubMed, ChEMBL, Clinical Trials, and 8 other research tools. NOT a licensed physician.
agents.notes: Most research-connected agent — 8 specialized connectors + 11-tool research workflow embedded. NPI Registry for provider lookup.

agents.name: Master Agent
agents.purpose: Orchestrator and strategic advisor — auto-discovers agents, maintains registry, runs audits with health scoring, cross-agent analysis and optimization.
agents.notes: Notion + Zapier embedded for ecosystem knowledge base + workflow automation. xlsx + enterprise-search + skill-creator refs active.
